bioconda.name: cufflinks
bioconda.summary: Transcriptome assembly and differential expression analysis for RNA-Seq.

biocontainers.name: cufflinks
biocontainers.summary: Cufflinks assembles transcripts and estimates their abundances in rna-seq samples. it accepts aligned rna-seq reads and assembles the alignments into a parsimonious set of transcripts. cufflinks then estimates the relative abundances of these transcripts based on how many reads support each one.

biotools.summary: Cufflinks assembles transcripts and estimates their abundances in RNA-Seq samples. It accepts aligned RNA-Seq reads and assembles the alignments into a parsimonious set of transcripts. Cufflinks then estimates the relative abundances of these transcripts based on how many reads support each one.

bioschemas.name: Cufflinks
bioschemas.summary: Cufflinks assembles transcripts and estimates their abundances in RNA-Seq samples. It accepts aligned RNA-Seq reads and assembles the alignments into a parsimonious set of transcripts. Cufflinks then estimates the relative abundances of these transcripts based on how many reads support each one.
